summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It indicates that FBI Special Agent Aaron Spivak has a new file for the case that needs to be transferred via USAfx, and requests coordination to receive it.

persons.name: Aaron Spivak
persons.context: He has a new file for the Ghislaine Maxwell case that needs to be sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office via USAfx.

keyFacts: An FBI agent, Aaron Spivak, has obtained a new file relevant to the Ghislaine Maxwell case as of May 2021.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York is actively coordinating to receive investigative materials for the Maxwell prosecution.
The communication shows ongoing evidence gathering and inter-agency coordination in the Maxwell case over a year after her arrest.
